name: DUNGEON Heating System
description:
Slime goes back to its old dungeon. The dungeon is now cold and dark. It wasn't before. Turns out that the heating system which keeps the temperature checked is broken. Help the monster regain their habitat by playing as Slime and turning the dungeon heater on or off.

Control:

  • A or D / Left or Right Arrow to move left or right
  • Space or W to Jump
  • F to interact
  • R to restart level (in-game)
  • Esc to return to Main Menu
  • M to toggle mute music/mute all/unmute

This game is made during the Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1.

Theme: Temperature is Key
